    // getæ¥æ”¶å€¼

      // ...

// tarckä¸triggeræœåŠ¡äºeffectï¼Œå› æ­¤è¦è¢«è°ƒç”¨å‡ºæ¥æ‰§è¡Œå¤„ç†

const tarck = (target, key) => {}
const trigger = (target, key) => {}

tarck æ”¶é›†ä¾èµ–å­˜å‚¨åˆ°æœ¬åœ°æˆ–è€…æŸä¸ªå˜é‡ä¸­ï¼ˆæœ€å¥½å­˜ä¸€ä¸ªä¸€ä¸€æ˜ å°„çš„å…³ç³»ï¼‰ã€‚vue3æºç ä½¿ç”¨çš„æ˜¯ weakMap ï¼Œä¸ºäº†æ–¹ä¾¿è¿™é‡Œç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨ map å³å¯ã€‚

æ¥æ”¶ target ç›®æ ‡å¯¹è±¡å’Œ key é”®ï¼Œç„¶ååšä»¥ä¸‹æ“ä½œï¼š

  • å®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ª map å˜é‡ targetMap
  • åˆ¤æ–­å½“å‰æ‰§è¡Œçš„ effect å‡½æ•°æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œä¸å­˜åœ¨ä¸åšä»»ä½•å¤„ç†ï¼Œå­˜åœ¨åˆ™ç»§ç»­å¾€ä¸‹æ“ä½œ
  • é€šè¿‡ targetMap.get(target) æ–¹æ³•è·å– target ï¼Œåˆ¤æ–­è¯¥ç›®æ ‡æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œä¸å­˜åœ¨åˆ™å®šä¹‰ä¸º map å¯¹è±¡ deepMapï¼Œé€šè¿‡ targetMap.set() æ–¹æ³•æŠŠ target èµ‹å€¼ç»™è¯¥ deepMap å˜é‡ï¼Œå­˜åœ¨åˆ™ç»§ç»­å¾€ä¸‹æ“ä½œ
  • é€šè¿‡ deepMap.get(key) è·å–åˆ°æ˜ å°„çš„å€¼ï¼Œåˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œä¸å­˜åœ¨åˆ™ Set è®¾ç½®ï¼Œé€šè¿‡ set æ–¹æ³•èµ‹å€¼
  • æœ€åç”¨ add æ–¹æ³•æ·»åŠ æ•°æ®
js
// 1.å»ºç«‹æ˜ å°„
const targetMap = new Map()
let activeEffect; // åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨çš„å…¨å±€å˜é‡

const tarck = (target, key) => {
  // 2.åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œå¦‚æœä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œç›´æ¥ç»“æŸå‡½æ•°
  if(!activeEffect) return

  // 3.
  let deepMap = targetMap.get(target)
  if(!deepMap) {
    deepMap = new Map()
    targetMap.set(target, deepMap)
  }

  // 4.
  let deps = deepMap.get(key)
  if(!deps) {
    deps = new Set()
    deepMap.set(key, deps)
  }

  // 5.
  deps.add(activeEffect)
}

trigger

  • è·å–å®šä¹‰çš„ targetMap.get() çš„é”®å€¼ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰ï¼Œä¸æ‰§è¡Œåç»­æ“ä½œ
  • depsMap.get(key) è·å–é”®å€¼ï¼Œæ²¡æœ‰ä¸æ‰§è¡Œåç»­æ“ä½œ
  • éå†é”®å€¼æ‰§è¡Œå‡½æ•°
js
const trigger = (target, key) => {
  const depsMap = targetMap.get(target)
  if(!depsMap) return

  const deps = depsMap.get(key)
  if(!deps) return

  deps.forEach(effectFn => effectFn());
}

effect å¤„ç†ç›¸åº”çš„å‡½æ•°å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œè¿”å›å‡½æ•°è®©å¤–éƒ¨å¯ä»¥æ‰§è¡Œï¼Œç„¶åè‡ªè°ƒç”¨æ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡ã€‚

js

  const effectFn = () => {
    activeEffect = fn
    return fn()
  }

  // å…ˆæ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡
  effectFn()

  return effectFn
}

è°ƒç”¨ effect ï¼Œä¼ å…¥ä¸€ä¸ªå‡½æ•°ï¼Œå®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡è°ƒç”¨å¹¶ä¿®æ”¹å€¼ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ï¼š

bugä¿®å¤ #

æ­¤æ—¶æ§åˆ¶å°æ‰“å°çš„æ•ˆæœå¦‚ä¸‹æ‰€ç¤ºï¼š

å¯ä»¥å‘ç°ï¼Œåªè¾“å‡ºäº†åµŒå¥—è°ƒç”¨çš„ count ï¼Œç›´æ¥è¾“å‡ºçš„ num æ²¡æœ‰äº†ã€‚

è¿™æ˜¯å› ä¸ºå®ƒä»¬æ˜¯åŒåå‡½æ•°ï¼Œå†…éƒ¨çš„å‡½æ•°ä¼šè¦†ç›–å¤–éƒ¨çš„å‡½æ•°ã€‚å®è´¨ä¸Šï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬è°ƒç”¨çš„æ˜¯å¤–éƒ¨çš„å‡½æ•°ï¼Œè€Œè¿è¡Œçš„æ˜¯å†…éƒ¨çš„å‡½æ•°ï¼Œå› æ­¤å°±ä¼šå‡ºç°ä¸Šé¢çš„bugã€‚

è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼šæŠŠæ¯ä¸€æ¬¡è°ƒç”¨çš„å‡½æ•°éƒ½ä¿å­˜åˆ°æ•°ç»„å†…ï¼Œå­˜å‚¨æ›´å˜ä¹‹å‰çš„å‡½æ•°ï¼Œæ‰§è¡Œå®Œæ¯•åå†æ¸…é™¤ã€‚

js
const arr = []

// tarckä¸triggeræœåŠ¡äºeffectï¼Œå› æ­¤è¦è¢«è°ƒç”¨å‡ºæ¥
const effect = fn => {
  const effectFn = () => {
    try {
      arr.push(effectFn)
      activeEffect = fn
      return fn()
    } finally {
      arr.pop()
      activeEffect = arr[arr.length - 1]
    }
  }

  // å…ˆæ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡
  effectFn()

  return effectFn
}

refå®ç° #

åŸç† #

é€šè¿‡è°ƒç”¨å¹¶è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªç±»ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­ï¼Œç±»çš„ get æ–¹æ³•æ¥æ”¶ value å¹¶èµ‹å€¼ï¼Œset æ–¹æ³•ä¿®æ”¹ value å€¼ã€‚

ä½¿ç”¨ tarck å’Œ trigger æ”¶é›†ä¾èµ–ã€‚

js
import {effect, reactive, trigger, tarck} from './effect.js'

export const ref = value => {
  return new RefImpl(value)
}

// å£°æ˜ç±»ï¼Œåšè·å–ã€èµ‹å€¼æ“ä½œ
class RefImpl {
  constructor(value) {
    this._value = value
  }

  get value() {
    tarck(this, 'value')
    return this._value
  }

  set value(newValue) {
    this._value = newValue
    trigger(this, 'value')
  }
}

ç­”ç–‘è§£æƒ‘ #

ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆè¿”å› this._value è€Œè°ƒç”¨æ—¶æ˜¯ count.value ï¼Ÿ

get å’Œ set å®é™…ä¸Šæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªä»£ç†ï¼Œä»£ç†æ‹¬å·å‰é¢çš„é‚£ä¸ªå˜é‡ï¼Œ_value æ˜¯å®ƒä»¬å†…éƒ¨æ“ä½œçš„å˜é‡ã€‚

computedå®ç° #

åˆæ­¥å®ç° #

ç…§çŒ«ç”»è™ï¼Œç…§ ref å®ç° computed ã€‚

computed æ¥æ”¶çš„å‚æ•°æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå‡½æ•°ï¼Œå› æ­¤è¦å»è°ƒæ•´å‚æ•°ï¼ŒæŠŠ value æ¢ä¸º getter ï¼Œç±»ä¸­ä¸æ˜¯é€šè¿‡ this. ç›´æ¥èµ‹å€¼ï¼Œè€Œæ˜¯é€šè¿‡ effect å‡½æ•°æ¥æ”¶é›†ä¾èµ–å®ç°ã€‚set æ–¹æ³•ä¹Ÿä¸éœ€è¦äº†ï¼Œé€šè¿‡ effect æ¥èµ‹å€¼æ“ä½œã€‚

js
import {effect, reactive, trigger, tarck} from './effect.js'
import { ref } from "./ref.js";

export const computed = getter => {
  return new ComputedRefImpl(getter)
}

class ComputedRefImpl {
  constructor(getter) {
    this.effect = effect(getter, () => {
      trigger(this, 'value')
    })
  }

  get value() {
    this._value = this.effect()
    tarck(this, 'value')
    return this._value
  }
}

ç°åœ¨åªèƒ½æ¥æ”¶å‡½æ•°ï¼Œæ²¡æœ‰å¤„ç†å‡½æ•°ï¼Œå› æ­¤å›åˆ° effect å‡½æ•°å¤„ç†å‡½æ•°å®ç°è°ƒåº¦ã€‚

ç›®å‰ effect å‡½æ•°åªæ¥æ”¶ä¸€ä¸ªå‡½æ•°ï¼Œå£°æ˜ç¬¬äºŒä¸ªå½¢å‚è°ƒåº¦å™¨ï¼Œé»˜è®¤å€¼ä¸º null ã€‚

æŒ‚è½½è°ƒåº¦å‡½æ•°ï¼Œåˆ¤æ–­å½“å‰è°ƒåº¦å™¨æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œä¸ºç©ºåˆ™ä¸º effectFn èµ‹å€¼æŒ‚è½½ã€‚

ç›®å‰ä¸ºæ­¢è°ƒåº¦å™¨ä¸ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œå»åˆ° trigger æ‰§è¡Œè°ƒåº¦å™¨ï¼Œåˆ¤æ–­å½“å‰æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨è°ƒåº¦å‡½æ•°ï¼Œå¦‚æœå­˜åœ¨åˆ™å…ˆæ‰§è¡Œè°ƒåº¦å‡½æ•°ï¼Œæ²¡æœ‰åˆ™æ‰§è¡Œ effect æœ¬èº«ã€‚

js
export const effect = (fn, scheduler = null) => {
  const effectFn = () => {
    try {
      arr.push(effectFn)
      activeEffect = effectFn
      return fn()
    } finally {
      // ......
    }
  }

  // å…ˆæ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡
  effectFn()

  if(scheduler) effectFn.scheduler = scheduler

  return effectFn
}

export const trigger = (target, key) => {
  // ......

  deps.forEach(effectFn => {
    // å¦‚æœæœ‰è°ƒåº¦å‡½æ•°ï¼Œä¼˜å…ˆæ‰§è¡Œè°ƒåº¦å‡½æ•°ã€‚æ²¡æœ‰æ‰æ‰§è¡ŒeffectFnå‡½æ•°æœ¬èº«
    effectFn.scheduler ? effectFn.scheduler(effectFn) : effectFn()
  });
}

  console.log('b:' + b.value);
  console.log('c:' + c.value);

ç¼“å­˜å®ç° #

åŸç† #

è®¾ç½®ä¸€ä¸ªé”ï¼Œå¦‚æœå½“å‰å€¼æ²¡æœ‰æ›´æ”¹ï¼Œåˆ™é”ä¸º true è¡¨ç¤ºé”ä¸ŠçŠ¶æ€ï¼Œé€šè¿‡ get è¿”å›ä¿å­˜çš„å€¼ï¼›å¦‚æœå€¼å‘ç”Ÿæ›´æ”¹ï¼Œå³è§¦å‘æ›´æ–°åï¼Œé”çš„çŠ¶æ€æ”¹ä¸º false ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶è°ƒç”¨è°ƒåº¦å‡½æ•°è·å–æ–°å€¼ã€‚

js
// ......

class ComputedRefImpl {
  constructor(getter) {
    this._dirty = true
    this.effect = effect(getter, () => {
      if(!this._dirty) {
        this._dirty = false
        trigger(this, 'value')
      }
    })
  }

  get value() {
    if(this._dirty) {
      this._value = this.effect()
      this._dirty = false
      tarck(this, 'value')
    }

    return this._value
  }
}

æ¨¡å—æ¸²æŸ“ #

vueè¿ç”¨è™šæ‹ŸdomæŠ€æœ¯æ¥æé«˜æ€§èƒ½ã€‚è™šæ‹ŸdomæŠ€æœ¯ç®€è€Œè¨€ä¹‹æŒ‡çš„æ˜¯å…ˆå°†éœ€è¦æ¸²æŸ“çš„domèŠ‚ç‚¹åœ¨å†…å­˜ä¸­åˆ›å»ºå¥½ï¼Œå†é€šè¿‡æ¸²æŸ“å‡½æ•°ä¸€æ¬¡æ€§æ¸²æŸ“åˆ°é¡µé¢ä¸­ã€‚

æ¯æ¬¡domä¿®æ”¹éƒ½ä¼šå¼•èµ·é‡ç»˜æˆ–å›æµï¼Œå¤§é‡çš„domæ“ä½œä¼šæå¤§å½±å“æ€§èƒ½ã€‚ä½¿ç”¨è™šæ‹ŸdomæŠ€æœ¯ï¼Œå°±å¯ä»¥å…ˆåœ¨å†…å­˜ä¸­åˆ›å»ºå¥½domèŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œæ“ä½œå†…å­˜ä¸­çš„domèŠ‚ç‚¹æ¯”èµ·ç›´æ¥æ“ä½œé¡µé¢domèŠ‚ç‚¹æ€§èƒ½è¦å¥½ä¸å°‘ã€‚

å®ç° #

åˆ›å»ºè™šæ‹ŸèŠ‚ç‚¹ #

é€šè¿‡å‡½æ•°è·å–ä¼ å‚è¿”å›å¯¹è±¡çš„å½¢å¼åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ª vnode è™šæ‹ŸèŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚

  1. åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å±äºä»€ä¹ˆç±»å‹çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹

    • å¦‚æœç±»å‹ä¸º Text ï¼Œåˆ™æ˜¯æ–‡æœ¬ç±»å‹
    • å¦åˆ™æ˜¯å­èŠ‚ç‚¹
  2. åˆ¤æ–­å­å…ƒç´ å±äºä»€ä¹ˆç±»å‹èŠ‚ç‚¹
    • å¦‚æœç±»å‹ä¸ºå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼Œåˆ™æ˜¯å…ƒç´ ç±»å‹
    • å¦‚æœç±»å‹ä¸º Text ï¼Œåˆ™æ˜¯æ–‡æœ¬å­ç±»å‹
    • å¦‚æœç±»å‹ä¸º Array ï¼Œåˆ™æ˜¯æ•°ç»„å­ç±»å‹
  3. è¿”å›åŒ…è£…çš„å¯¹è±¡ï¼ŒåŒ…å«ç±»å‹ï¼Œå±æ€§ï¼Œå­å…ƒç´ ï¼Œæ ‡è®°ï¼Œç©º el ï¼Œkey
js
/**
 * åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªvnodeè™šæ‹ŸèŠ‚ç‚¹
 * @type è™šæ‹Ÿdonç±»å‹
 * @props å±æ€§
 * @children å­å…ƒç´ 
 */
const h = (type, props, children) => {
  let shapeFlag = 0 // æ ‡è®°ï¼šåŒºåˆ†ç±»å‹

  // æ ¹æ®typeå¤„ç†å¯¹åº”çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹ç±»å‹ï¼ŒæŠŠè®°å½•çš„ç±»å‹ä¿å­˜åœ¨shapeFlagä¸­ï¼Œåç»­åŒ…è£…æˆå¯¹è±¡è¿”å›
  if(typeof type === 'string') {
    shapeFlag |= SHAPEFLAG.ELEMENT
  } else if(type === Text) {
    shapeFlag |= SHAPEFLAG.TEXT
  } else {
    shapeFlag |= SHAPEFLAG.COMPONENT
  }

  // æ ¹æ®childrenå¤„ç†å¯¹åº”çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹ç±»å‹ï¼ŒæŠŠè®°å½•çš„ç±»å‹ä¿å­˜åœ¨shapeFlagä¸­ï¼Œåç»­åŒ…è£…æˆå¯¹è±¡è¿”å›
  if(typeof children === 'string') {
    shapeFlag |= SHAPEFLAG.ELEMENT
  } else if(children === 'number') {
    shapeFlag |= SHAPEFLAG.TEXT_CHILDREN
  } else if(Array.isArray(children)) {
    shapeFlag |= SHAPEFLAG.APPY_CHILDREN
  }

  return {
    type,
    props,
    children,
    shapeFlag,
    el: null,
    key: props && props.key
  }
}

  • å±æ€§å‡½æ•°æ¸²æŸ“

    éå†å±æ€§å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œé€šè¿‡ switch åˆ¤æ–­ï¼š

    • classï¼šç±»åæ·»åŠ 
    • styleï¼šæ ·å¼è®¾ç½®
    • onï¼šäº‹ä»¶ç»‘å®š
    js
    // å±æ€§éå†
const mountProps = (props, el) => {
  for (const key in props) {
    const value = props[key]
    switch (key) {
      case 'class':
        el.className = value
        break;
      case 'style':
        for (const styleName in value) {
          el.style[styleName] = value[styleName]
        }
        break;
      default:
        // åˆ¤æ–­äº‹ä»¶ï¼Œäº‹ä»¶éƒ½æ˜¯ä»¥onå¼€å¤´
        if(/^on[A-Z]/.test(key)){
          // æŠŠäº‹ä»¶åçš„onå»æ‰ï¼Œè½¬ä¸ºå°å†™ã€‚å¦‚ï¼šonClickè½¬ä¸ºclick
          const eventName = key.slice(2).toLowerCase()
          el.addEventListener(eventName, value)
        } else {
          el.setAttribute(key, value)
        }
        break;
    }
  }
}

æ­¥éª¤ #

  1. è·å–æ—§èŠ‚ç‚¹

  2. åˆ¤æ–­æ–°æ—§èŠ‚ç‚¹æ˜¯å¦ä¸€æ ·ï¼Œä¸€æ ·åˆ™ä¸éœ€è¦æ›´æ–°èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œä¸ä¸€æ ·åˆ™è€ƒè™‘ä»¥ä¸‹æƒ…å†µï¼š

    • å­˜åœ¨èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œæ›´æ–°ï¼ˆå…³é”®åœ¨äºå¯¹æ¯”æ–°æ—§èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„ç±»å‹ type ï¼‰åˆ¤æ–­ï¼Œå¦‚æœç±»å‹ä¸ä¸€è‡´ï¼Œé”€æ¯èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚è·å–æ ‡è®°ï¼Œåˆ¤æ–­å…¶ç±»å‹ï¼Œåšä¸åŒæ“ä½œ

      • å¦‚æœå­˜åœ¨ä¸”ä¸ºæ–‡æœ¬ç±»å‹ï¼Œåˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨æ–°èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚å­˜åœ¨åˆ™æ›´æ–°æ–‡æœ¬èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å†…å®¹ï¼Œä¸å­˜åœ¨åˆ™è°ƒç”¨å‰é¢å°è£…å¥½çš„å‡½æ•°æ–°å»ºæ–‡æœ¬èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚

      • å¦‚æœå­˜åœ¨ä¸”ä¸ºå…ƒç´ ç±»å‹ï¼Œåˆ¤æ–­æ—§èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸æ–°èŠ‚ç‚¹æ˜¯å¦ç›¸åŒï¼Œä¸€æ ·åˆ™ç›´æ¥è¿”å›ï¼Œä¸ä¸€æ ·åˆ™éå†æ—§èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å±æ€§å¯¹è±¡ã€‚

        å¦‚æœå¯¹åº”çš„æ–°èŠ‚ç‚¹è¯¥å±æ€§ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œæ›´æ–°æ–¹æ³•ï¼›éå†æ–°èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å±æ€§å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œè·å–å…¶æ—§å±æ€§çš„å€¼ä¸æ–°å±æ€§çš„å€¼ã€‚

        å†çœ‹çœ‹ä¸¤è€…æ˜¯å¦ä¸ç­‰ï¼Œä¸ç­‰åˆ™æ›´æ–°æ–¹æ³•ã€‚

        æ›´æ–°æ–¹æ³•çš„å‡½æ•°æ¥æ”¶æ–°æ—§èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œå¯¹åº”å±æ€§çš„ key ï¼Œæ¸²æŸ“çˆ¶èŠ‚ç‚¹ el ã€‚åˆ¤æ–­ç±»åã€æ ·å¼ã€äº‹ä»¶çš„åŠ¨æ€ä¿®æ”¹æˆ–ç§»é™¤ã€‚

        js
        const patchDomProps = (prev, next, key, el) => {
  switch (key) {
    case 'class':
      el.className = next || ''
      break;
    case 'style':
      if(next === null) {
        el.removeAttribute('style')
      } else {
        if(prev) {
          for (const styleName in object) {
            if(next[styleName] === null) {
              el.style[styleName] = ''
            }
          }
        }

        for (const styleName in next) {
          el.style[styleName] = next[styleName]
        }
      }
      break;
    default:
      if (/^on[A-Z]/.test(key)) {
        // æŠŠäº‹ä»¶åçš„onå»æ‰ï¼Œè½¬ä¸ºå°å†™ã€‚å¦‚ï¼šonClickè½¬ä¸ºclick
        const eventName = key.slice(2).toLowerCase()
        if(prev) el.removeEventListener(eventName)
        if(next) el.addEventListener(eventName)
      } else {
        if(next === null || next === false)
        el.removeAttribute(key)

        if(next) el.setAttribute(key)
      }
      break;
  }
}

      • æ›´æ–°å­èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œå­èŠ‚ç‚¹æ˜¯æ•°ç»„å½¢å¼ï¼Œå› æ­¤éœ€è¦è·å–æ—§å­èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„é•¿åº¦ï¼Œæ–°å­èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„é•¿åº¦å’ŒäºŒè€…æœ€å°çš„å€¼ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ–°å­èŠ‚ç‚¹é•¿åº¦å¤§äºæ—§å­èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œè¯´æ˜æœ‰æ–°å¢æ“ä½œï¼Œåä¹‹æ˜¯åˆ é™¤æ“ä½œ

    • ä¸å­˜åœ¨èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œç§»é™¤æ—§èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œåšé”€æ¯æ“ä½œ

    js
    const render = (vnode, container) => {
  const prevNode = container._vnode

  // åˆ¤æ–­æ—§èŠ‚ç‚¹æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
  if (vnode) {
    patch(prevNode, vnode, container)
  } else {
    prevNode && unmount(prevNode)
  }

  container.innerHTML = ''
  mount(vnode, container)
}

const patch = (v1, v2, container) => {
  // å¦‚æœç±»å‹ä¸ä¸€è‡´ï¼Œç›´æ¥é”€æ¯
  if (v1 && v1.type !== v2.type) {
    unmount(v1)
    v1 = null
  }

  const { shapeFlag } = v2
  if (shapeFlag & SHAPEFLAG.TEXT) {
    processTextNode(v1, v2, container)
  } else if (shapeFlag & SHAPEFLAG.ELEMENT) {
    processElement(v1, v2, container)
  }
}

const processTextNode = (v1, v2, container) => {
  if (v1) {
    v2.el = v1.el
    v1.el.textContent = v2.children
  } else {
    mountTextNode(v2, container)
  }
}

const processElement = (v1, v2, container) => {
  if (v1) {
    v2.el = v1.el

    patchProps(v1.props, v2.props, el)
    patchChildren(v1, v2, v2.el)
  } else {
    mountELEMENT(v2, container)
  }
}

const patchProps = (old, newProps, el) => {
  if (old === newProps) {
    return
  }

  for (const key in old) {
    if (newProps[key] === null) {
      patchDomProps(old[key], null, key, el)
    }
  }

  for (const key in newProps) {
    const prew = old[key]
    const next = newProps[key]

    if (prew !== next) {
      patchDomProps(prev, next, key, el)
    }
  }
}

const patchChildren = (v1, v2, el) => {
  const {shapeFlag: prevShap, children: prevChildren} = v1
  const {shapeFlag: nextShap, children: nextChildren} = v2

  if(prevShap & SHAPEFLAG.TEXT_CHILDREN) {
    if(nextShap & SHAPEFLAG.TEXT_CHILDREN) {
      el.textContent = nextChildren
    } else if(nextShap & SHAPEFLAG.APPY_CHILDREN) {
      el.textContent = ''
      mountChildren(nextChildren, el)
    } else {
      el.textContent = ''
    }
  } else if(prevShap & SHAPEFLAG.APPY_CHILDREN) {
    if(nextShap&SHAPEFLAG.TEXT_CHILDREN) {
      el.textContent = nextChildren
    } else if(nextShap & SHAPEFLAG.APPY_CHILDREN) {
      const oldLength = prevChildren.length
      const newLength = nextChildren.length
      const commonLength = Math.min(oldLength, newLength)

      for (let i = 0; i < commonLength; i++) {
        patch(prevChildren[i], nextChildren[i], el)
      }
      if(oldLength > newLength) {} else if(oldLength < newLength) {
        mountChildren(nextChildren.slice(commonLength), el)
      }
    }
  }
}

const patchDomProps = (prev, next, key, el) => {
  switch (key) {
    case 'class':
      el.className = next || ''
      break;
    case 'style':
      if(next === null) {
        el.removeAttribute('style')
      } else {
        if(prev) {
          for (const styleName in object) {
            if(next[styleName] === null) {
              el.style[styleName] = ''
            }
          }
        }

        for (const styleName in next) {
          el.style[styleName] = next[styleName]
        }
      }
      break;
    default:
      if (/^on[A-Z]/.test(key)) {
        // æŠŠäº‹ä»¶åçš„onå»æ‰ï¼Œè½¬ä¸ºå°å†™ã€‚å¦‚ï¼šonClickè½¬ä¸ºclick
        const eventName = key.slice(2).toLowerCase()
        if(prev) el.removeEventListener(eventName)
        if(next) el.addEventListener(eventName)
      } else {
        if(next === null || next === false)
        el.removeAttribute(key)

        if(next) el.setAttribute(key)
      }
      break;
  }
}

Diffç®—æ³• #

æ€è·¯ #

æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªåœºæ™¯ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬æœ‰5ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ï¼šaã€bã€cï¼Œæƒ³è¦å˜æ›´ä¸ºaã€dã€bã€cï¼Œé€šè¿‡ diff ç®—æ³•å®ç°è½¬åŒ–ã€‚aèŠ‚ç‚¹æ˜¯ä¸€æ ·çš„ï¼Œä¸å˜ï¼Œç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨æ—§èŠ‚ç‚¹å³å¯ï¼Œå¤´æŒ‡é’ˆå¾€åï¼›ä»åçœ‹cèŠ‚ç‚¹ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ä¸€æ ·çš„ï¼Œä¸å˜ï¼Œç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨æ—§èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œå°¾æŒ‡é’ˆå¾€å‰ã€‚

diff ç®—æ³•æ ¸å¿ƒæ˜¯å…ˆåšé¢„å¤„ç†ï¼Œå¤„ç†å¤´æŒ‡é’ˆå’Œå°¾æŒ‡é’ˆçš„ç»‘å®šï¼Œä¸­é—´éƒ¨åˆ†åç»­åšæ›´æ–°å¤„ç†ã€‚
